sources.title: Six-Gun Rhythm (1939)
sources.description: Western - When football player Tex fletcher arives home he finds his father missing. Jim Davis has killed the father and learning of Tex's identity -  Tex Fletcher, Joan Barclay, Ralph Peters Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/six-gun-rhythm-1939/

sources.title: Six-Gun Rhythm
sources.description: When football player Tex Fletcher arrives home he finds his father missing. Jim Davis has killed the father and learning of Tex's identity, sends his men to kill him. But when Tex kills one of the attackers, Davis' stooge Sheriff puts Tex in jail. You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Six-Gun Rhythm (1939) SINGING COWBOY
sources.description:
Stars: Tex Fletcher, Joan Barclay, Ralph Peters
Director: Sam Newfield

When an ex-football player arrives home at the family cattle ranch, he discovers his father murdered by rustlers, and now the killers are after him!

sources.title: Six-Gun Rhythm (1939) Full Length Western Movie
sources.description:
Tex Fletcher returns home and kills a henchman of Jim Davis when he tries to kill him. After he is thrown in jail, Tex learns Jim killed his father and vows revenge. 

Director: Sam Newfield
Writers: Ted Richmond , Fred Myton
Stars: Tex Fletcher, Joan Barclay, Ralph Peters
Genres: Western
